dn14:1.4.1: ekanavutikappe → ekanavuto kappo (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
dn14:1.4.2: ekatiṃse kappe → ekatiṃso kappo (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
dn14:1.12.7: suppatito nāma → suppatīto nāma (bj, s1-3, pts1)
dn14:1.12.8: Vassavatī nāma → yasavatī nāma (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
dn14:1.21.2: Tatrāssa → tatra yaṃ (bj) | tatrassa (s1-3, km, pts1)
dn14:1.27.1: udena → uddena (bj, s1-3, km, pts1) | udarena (katthaci), asucinā suddho → visuddho (s1-3)
dn14:1.35.1: kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassī kumāro mañjussaro ca → kumāro brahmassaro mañjussaro ca (mr)
dn14:1.37.2: Animisanto kumāro pekkhatī’ti kho, bhikkhave → jātassa kho pana bhikkhave (s1-3) | animmissantā pekkhāti evameva kho bhikkheve (km) | jātassa kho pana bhikkhave (mr)
dn14:1.38.3: Tatra sudaṃ, bhikkhave, vipassī kumāro vassike pāsāde cattāro māse → vassike pāsāde vassike cattāro māse (bj, pts1)
dn14:2.16.5: pana mayan’ti → pana na mayanti (s1-3, km, pts1), kimaṅgaṃ → kimaṅga (bj, pts1)
dn14:2.17.2: na kho metaṃ → na kho panetaṃ (s1-3, km) | na kho me taṃ (pts1)
dn14:2.18.2: jīyati ca mīyati ca → jiyyati ca miyyati ca (mr)
dn14:3.6.2: suviññāpaye duviññāpaye → duviññāpaye bhabbe abhabbe (s1-3, km)
